item.title: Handling timezone in Spring Boot
item.description: LocalDateTime vs ZonedDateTime LocalDateTime: Time based on system timezone ZonedDateTime: Time based on system or user-defined timezone LocalDateTime.now(); // 2020-03-02T06:48:56.623993 ZonedDateTime.now(); // 2020-03-02T06:48:56.616338Z[Etc/UTC] ZonedDateTime.now().withZoneSameInstant(memberZone); // 2020-03-02T15:48:56.619674+09:00[Asia/Seoul] ZonedDateTime.now(memberZone); // 2020-03-02T15:48:56.622355+09:00[Asia/Seoul] LocalDateTime.
